## Voice.requestFullScreenNotificationPermission() method

Opens the Android System Settings app to attempt to request Full Screen Notification permissions.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
requestFullScreenNotificationPermission(): Promise<void>;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;void&gt;

A `Promise` that - Resolves `void` if the Android System Settings app was opened. - Rejects if the Android system encountered an error while trying to open the System Settings app.

## Remarks

Unsupported platforms: - iOS
